title: Installation
answer:
You can remove the battery cover from your phone. 

 Your phone supports a micro-SIM card. Contact your network operator to replace or purchase a micro-SIM card. 

 Your phone supports one SIM card and one microSD card. Install the micro-SIM card and microSD card in place according to the instructions on the card holders. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110488)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110489)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110490)

 After you complete these steps, you are now ready to begin using your H30. Press and hold the power key for a few seconds to power it on. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110491)

 Do not insert or remove the micro-SIM card when the phone is powered on. 

 [To avoid a network registration failure caused by installation errors, do not exchange places of the SIM card and the microSD card. ]()
